author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Of Glencore's quest for riches vast,
Its gaze on Teck's coal treasures cast,
A union sought for to pursue,
Or buy the unit's worth anew.

In oil's unstable realm we see,
Futures slip 'fore our very eyes,
Whilst eager minds on US rates be,
The tightening market set aside.

The Sterling hangs in balance fine,
As rate rise bets may fade away,
Awaiting wage and age's sign,
If weak, its fortitude doth sway.

feedItems.title: Glencore Approaches Teck Over Its Coal Business
feedItems.description: The commodities giant is willing to buy Teck’s unit as an alternative to a full merger.

feedItems.title: Oil Slips as Investors Await US Rate Decision
feedItems.description: Oil futures were close to 1.5% lower in Europe, with concerns about the economic outlook driving prices down and as investors, for now, ignoring signs of a sharply tightening market.

feedItems.title: Sterling Vulnerable as UK Rate Rise Bets Could Be Revised Lower
feedItems.description: Sterling could be exposed to a potential scaling back of the market’s interest rate rise expectations for the BOE, if upcoming U.K. wage and inflation data are weaker, ING said.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
To Georg Fischer's tune, a tale I tell,
Of Finland's Uponor, bid doth swell,
With €2.1 billion in shares adroit,
To boost water and flow, the business unite.

Of Autoliv doth sing my quill,
Confirms outlook in 2023, and targets fulfill,
Organic growth of fifteen percent, doth they foresee,
And margin adjusted, 'twixt eight point five and nine, decree.

Now cometh ye tale of bond and yield,
Of BTP Italia and German Bunds in the field,
In fair and balanced spreads they meet,
As Eurozone's tightening spreads take seat.

feedItems.title: Georg Fischer Makes Bid for Finland's Uponor
feedItems.description: Industrial supplier Georg Fischer has made an all-share offer to buy peer Uponor for €2.1 billion as it looks to boost its water- and flow-solutions business.

feedItems.title: Autoliv Confirms 2023 Outlook, Other Targets
feedItems.description: Autoliv said it still expects to report organic sales growth of around 15% and an adjusted operating margin of around 8.5%-9.% this year, and reiterated its medium- and long-term financial targets.

feedItems.title: Ten-Year Italian BTP-German Bund Yield Spread Seen at Fair Level
feedItems.description: Eurozone government bond yield spreads may continue tightening, but the 10-year Italian BTP-German Bund spread is at fair levels, BofA Global Research said.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In Novo's land of healing wares,
A bounty pledged with utmost care,
Two billion gold, and change to spare,
For ailments' bane to make most rare.

In eastern realm of rising sun,
The Nikkei climbs, as traders run,
Awaiting wisdom, rates begun,
Decisions made when dawn is spun.

Of metal, sheen both strong and lean,
The fickle worth of Aluminum,
A pressure mounts, as excess seen,
A falling tide in autumn's gleam.

feedItems.title: Novo Nordisk To Boost Output Capability
feedItems.description: Novo Nordisk said it plans to invest $2.3 billion to expand a pharmaceutical ingredient production facility in Denmark for its future portfolio within serious chronic diseases.

feedItems.title: Nikkei Rises 0.5% as Investors Await Economic Data, Rate Decisions
feedItems.description: Japan’s Nikkei closed up 0.5%, as investors awaited major economic data and central bank decisions this week.

feedItems.title: Aluminum Prices Likely to Stay Under Pressure
feedItems.description: Aluminum is likely to remain under pressure, SDIC Essence Futures said, expecting supply excess to emerge in the third quarter, which could pose a downside risk for prices.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In distant lands of commerce vast,
The mighty Novartis grasped ;
A Chinook Therapeutics behold,
Acquired for shining coins, untold.

In sails of labor's stern embrace,
Not a climb, but coast we face;
As that which stalls, is not as it seems,
The fairest path, midst life's streams.

Tho' interest climbs and gold grows thin,
Determined hearts, Wall Street doth win;
On sturdy back of consumer class,
The tide of fortune's fees do pass.

feedItems.title: Novartis to Buy U.S.-Based Chinook
feedItems.description: Novartis has agreed to acquire Chinook Therapeutics for up to $3.5 billion, in a deal that will expand its portfolio of kidney disease treatments.

feedItems.title: The Smart Way to Coast at Work
feedItems.description: Sometimes, it’s not the moment to climb. That doesn’t mean you’ve stalled.

feedItems.title: Wall Street Firms Up Bets on U.S. Consumers
feedItems.description: Rising interest rates and inflation have barely dented most borrowers’ bill payments.
